channel.title: Need connection help plz
channel.description:
i've got my server ready but friends still cant connect to it , wtf y is this? i got nixscape and an ip on no-ip.org
and i've opened port 43594 on my firewall
im trying to get me a router or whatever the thing is from here www.portforward.com/routers.html
but i donno wth i gotta do with those -.- need some help plz and i got another problem on my nixscape server:
i've set the ancient mage spells
but i cant get em to work , not even the normal mage
help me plz ;)

item.title: Need connection help plz

yo, IM HAVING THE SAME PROBLEM NEWBOW. I CAN’T EVEN OPEN UP MY FIREWALL. IT SAYS IT CANNOT OPEN CUZ THE SERVICE ISENT RUNNING… WTF?!? WHAT IS THAT SERVICE? IM SEARCHING LIKE HELL FOR IT ON MSCONFIG.
